text: Carlos Burga (12 May 1952 - 18 January 2021) was a Peruvian boxer. He competed in the men's welterweight event at the 1972 Summer Olympics. Burga also competed in the welterweight class at the 1975 Pan American Games. Burga died on 18 January 2021 from COVID-19 in Lima, Peru at the age of 68.Carlos Burga, histórico boxeador peruano, falleció víctima del coronavirus ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympians for Peru Category:Boxers Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Lima
title: Carlos Burga
